title: can't remember password
content: unknowingly i have uninstalled mozilla and that included thunderbird which i use for my emails + calander. I have installed thunderbird again but unable to access my emails and calander which i really need access to. The email address i use we have had forever and when the company i started up with sold i was able to keep using my email address through The Messaging Company (Australia) by paying a yearly subscription. Can someone help me access my account please. Also am not very tech savvy so hopefully nothing too complicated would be very much appreciated. Kind regards
creator: rpkemorrell

title: The previously saved templates cannot be found anymore after the upgrade
content: After upgrading the Thunderbird Desktop, when editing the email, I found that the previously saved email template could not be found, and there was no entry to open the template in the menu bar either. I couldn't find a solution, please help. (PS. In the red box of the screenshot, it was originally a mail template.)

title: How to Import Thunderbird to Outlook
content: If you want to migrate the Thunderbird to Office 365, there are a couple of way to tackle this challenge. We use manual methods or third-party tool but manual method are difficult to implement it required lot of efforts and still have chances of data corruption. keeping all in mind, we required third-party solution that can this task quickly and smoothly. Shoviv MBOX to Office 365 Converter is a handy tool that makes the migration of Thunderbird to Office 365 easy for all kinds of users. The tool comes with a bunch of features so users can do the migration selectively, such as the software is capable of converting a group of MBOX files in a few clicks and the tool makes sure all mail data remains the same as the original.
creator: louisyoung044

title: Problema con invio email da Thunderbird tramite account Microsoft 365 – errore SMTP con OAuth2
content:
Salve, sto riscontrando un problema con l'invio di email da Thunderbird utilizzando un account Microsoft 365 (tipo aziendale). La configurazione IMAP funziona correttamente con autenticazione OAuth2 e riesco a ricevere la posta.

Tuttavia, l’invio fallisce con il seguente messaggio di errore: Accesso al server smtp.office365.com con nome utente [indirizzo email] non riuscito.

Le impostazioni SMTP che sto utilizzando sono:

Server: smtp.office365.com Porta: 587 Sicurezza: STARTTLS Metodo di autenticazione: OAuth2

Thunderbird è aggiornato all’ultima versione. Ho già cancellato le credenziali salvatee verificato che la finestra di login Microsoft per OAuth venga visualizzata correttamente.

Nonostante ciò, l’invio non funziona. Chiedo se ci sono ulteriori passaggi da seguire o configurazioni specifiche da verificare lato client o server.

Grazie per l’assistenza.
creator: zakariamiri.digital

title: Unable to Send Emails from Thunderbird – SMTP Login Fails
content:
Dear Support,

I am experiencing an issue with sending emails through Thunderbird using my account mateja@flurti.si. I haven't changed any settings, passwords, or configurations, but all of a sudden, I can no longer send messages.

Thunderbird is asking me to re-enter my SMTP password, but it keeps failing, even though the password is correct. I’ve verified all SMTP settings, including the server, port, encryption, and authentication method. Receiving emails works fine — only sending is affected.

Could you please check if:

My IP address or account has been temporarily blocked?

Any changes were made on the server side (e.g., authentication policy, SMTP access, etc.)?

An "app password" is now required for SMTP access?

I would appreciate your help resolving this as soon as possible.

Best regards, Mateja Rijavec Flurti d.o.o.
creator: mateja105

title: Thunderbird
content:
I just got a new computer and downloaded Mozilla Thunderbird, it was working fine and the I had to have the Geek Squard help with installing my printer and the agent that was working on it couldn't help me, so after I got off with him I no longer could send out emails. Called the second time and the agent I had helped with setting up the printer but could get Thunderbird to send emails, he told me I needed to contact you. But since there's no phone number I can't contact you that way and I don't understand how to do it myself (I'm 74 years old) because I don't understand. Is there someone who can help me or walk me through to get my email back up and running please?

Help Roger D. Reed
creator: pstrreed

title: Accidentally deleted an email
content: This morning an email from my inbox accidentally went into my deleted box. I have always been able to click on "More" and been able to move it back into my inbox. Today "More" had new options and moving to another location was not one of them. What happened? I often click 'delete' by mistake and have to move it back to where I really meant the email to go.
creator: drongie

title: Não consigo acessar minha conta.
content: Bom dia, me chamo Vieira. Estava utilizando o thunderbird na versão windows 7 e precisei atualizar meu sistema operacional para o windows 10. Agora estou querendo entrar no meu email e não consigo passar da tela de configuração de contas. Aparece um erro dizendo que a configuração, nome de usuário e a senha estão provavelmente errados. Poderia me ajudar a configurar esse email?
